title: Tuesday Post Show (06-07-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (06-07-22)
description:
Bobby starts with a Morning Corny After Dark that he couldn’t play on the air. The largest 4-day work week trial is underway in the UK involving 70 companies. Bobby shares tips about our office if you ever visit here. We get an update on the shoes Lunchbox is selling on eBay and what they want to do with the money they made. We also talk about who on the show suffers from imposter syndrome. Bobby reads a listener email who ranked all the members of the show.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby starts with a Morning Corny After Dark that he couldn’t play on the air. The largest 4-day work week trial is underway in the UK involving 70 companies. Bobby shares tips about our office if you ever visit here. We get an update on the shoes Lunchbox is selling on eBay and what they want to do with the money they made. We also talk about who on the show suffers from imposter syndrome. Bobby reads a listener email who ranked all the members of the show.
